title: Bronze | Looking for Mentor/Coach
body:
Hey guys recently after playing and improving I've decided to look for a coach/mentor to help me improve..
I'm looking to learn roles of Support and Jungle; if anyone can help that'd be great!

Just add me in-game and message me there.. I will have a payment/reward as well..

We will talk about it in detail in private message in-game! 
Thanks!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
WHen you have four thousand HP, hide in bushes until team dies then come out hoping to get kills.

If you have low health.. well, THEN we want you out on the front line because you have SO MUCH DAMAGE and if you have any crowd control? yeah, nah, we don't need that so do not even bother leveling that skill at all. 

Go watch one or two pro games, ignore everything bout the time they group or the towers they defend... just look at the champs they play and they build they have... and pick the champ and go all in at level 1 and 1 and 2 and you MIGHT hit 3 by the time you die the fifth time. Then look at your team list (this is VERY important) find one thing ANYTHING that looks non meta and call them a troll and a feeder (if they have only half the amounts of deaths as you, do not worry, it does not matter) and then get your friends to report them!

Do this enough times and Riot suspend or punish them and you won't have to worry about getting better YOURSELF or anything! FREE WINS :D

I cant really respect one who trolls a person who genuinely wants to learn to be better
I wish I can downvote more
